about.title: About Us
about.bio: I am G'ozibekova Mamlakat Xudayberdiyevna, an individual entrepreneur engaged in handmade jewelry production in national style for 4 years.
about.description: I create from simple metals tillaqosh, zebigardon, earrings, bracelets, rings, tika, crowns, diadems, juliettas, abadok, handmade bags and other national and modern jewelry. Each product is made with attention and has its own unique style.
about.craftsmanship: High-quality workmanship and carefully selected materials make each piece unique and long-lasting. I always create new styles and manufacture products that meet my clients' wishes.
exhibitionsList: 3-day participation in III Handicrafters Festival in Qo'qon
